name: Incarnate Gloom
description: The Incarnate Gloom is a gargantuan undead creature designed to instill fear and despair. It is cloaked in magical darkness, blending into the shadowy environment and making it hard to detect.
memorable: It generates a permanent sphere of magical darkness, impenetrable to normal light and darkvision, and can engulf enemies in shadow, blinding and restraining them.
goals: To instill fear, manipulate darkness, and defeat foes through despair and control.
relations: Often found in the company of other undead or dark creatures, acting as a master in dark domains.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy areas or as guardians of forgotten tombs.
strengths: Excellent at stealth and intimidation, and immune to many conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, which can significantly hinder its effectiveness.
attacks: Uses a multiattack with its Despairing Touch to deal psychic damage and Engulf in Shadow to trap and harm foes.
most_powerful_ability: Deepening Gloom, which enshrouds the area in magical darkness that is impervious to darkvision.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through normal and magical darkness.
skills: Proficient in intimidation and stealth, making it highly effective in ambushes.
additional_information: Can move through other creatures and objects.
Inflicts necrotic damage and can cause exhaustion.
Can be affected by the calm emotions spell, leading to psychic damage.
Immunities to necrotic and poison damage.
Resistant to several damage types including acid, cold, fire, lightning, and thunder.
test_queries: creature that engulfs foes in shadows
